title: Feiz, the last expert
creator_credit: Milan Chupurdija, Ceda Oketich and Perspective Films
brief_description: This film portrays a man and his son in Belgrade, Yugoslavia, who scratch out a living by travelling the streets in search of pots and pans to repair. The occupation of “tinker” is the focus of this film, one which is seen as diminishing.
